title: april 1: april fools’ day [hosted by: Ricky Montgomery]
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host Ricky Montgomery talks about the history of April Fools’ Day. After, he reflects on the song that has been pranking us all on YouTube for years. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
